description: Unique identifier for a HERE/location-tracking session tied to this record; used to group position reports across a single app/device session (likely generated by the HERE SDK or service; confirm with SME).
Account name of the person, device, or system associated with the session or record (e.g., operator login or service account) used for attribution and auditing.
Geographic longitude in decimal degrees for the recorded position; negative values indicate west of the prime meridian. Typically captured from GPS/HERE services.
Geographic latitude in decimal degrees for the recorded position; negative values indicate south of the equator. Typically captured from GPS/HERE services.
User or system account that created the record, for provenance and audit trail.
Timestamp when the record was created in the source system; format includes fractional seconds. Timezone not explicit; confirm with SME.
User or system account that last modified the record, supporting change tracking and auditing.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record in the source system; includes fractional seconds. Timezone not explicit; confirm with SME.
